posts.post_title: For Sale: T2o6 Lot - Mathewson, Off-Backs, Rare Doyle N.Y individual offers welcome
posts.post_content:
Looking to move my t2o6 duplicates. Lower grade lot. Very presentable Christy Mathewson w SC op fact.42. Joe Doyle PB partial Y missing 2nd dot. 9 cards in all (moving to eBay) Or Best Offer/individual offers welcome . PayPal FF. Ships insured, tracking w signature.
Thanks 
-Ryan

Most of these are set to close Sunday evening on Ebay. 
Thanks for the inquiry.
Ryan
